item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, April 26, 2025 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:

4. Lossless LLM compression for efficient GPU inference via dynamic-length float (353 points | 107 comments)

21. Amazon Japan ordered to pay 35M. yen for allowing listing of fakes (89 points | 15 comments)

25. Tumor-derived erythropoietin acts as immunosuppressive switch in cancer immunity (136 points | 36 comments)
26. Mobygratis – Free Moby music to empower your creative projects (33 points | 9 comments)
27. Avoiding skill atrophy in the age of AI (225 points | 242 comments)
28. Show HN: Magnitude – open-source, AI-native test framework for web apps (158 points | 38 comments)
29. Show HN: I used OpenAI's new image API for a personalized coloring book service (236 points | 128 comments)
